forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 5 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 5 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
A gentle light filters through the city, accentuating the crisp clarity of the morning in Downtown San Francisco. The sun casts its golden hue on the iconic skyline, revealing a landscape momentarily untouched by fog—though it lingers just beyond, hinting at its inevitable return. Today promises to be sunny, with heavenly temperatures ascending to a comfortable 66 degrees, pleasantly tempered by the west-southwest winds gently stirring at 5 to 17 mph, their breath a soft whisper of spring. 

As the day unfolds, expect temperatures to slightly retreat as afternoon approaches, inviting a light sweater or jacket for those stepping out or enjoying the cool air of the evening. The low tonight settles around 50 degrees, draping the city in serenity as the stars emerge. With such splendid weather, it is a perfect day for a leisurely morning walk through the parks or visiting a local café, perhaps finding a quiet corner to savor a book while the world flits about. A visit to nearby markets, buzzing with energy, will stimulate the senses—it's simply a day to soak in the charm that the city effortlessly offers.
